/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their gray and brown facades blending harmoniously with the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of complexity to the otherwise orderly cityscape. A river meanders through the center of the street, its calm waters reflecting the surrounding structures. On the left side of the street, a construction site is visible, hinting at the ongoing development in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive backdrop. The image is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, presenting a typical day in the life of this bustling city.
